channel.title: PHP on David Amador
channel.description: Recent content in PHP on David Amador

item.title: PHP Optimization Tips
item.description: As most languages PHP allows many ways to solve a problem. Some are faster then others. Here are a few ways to improve your PHP code. Loop At some point your program will require a loop. And loop is considered as efficiency killer if you have many nested loop (means loop in a loop) as one loop will required to run ‘n’ times and if you have 1 nested loop, this means your program will have to run n2 times.
